## IPositionable.position() method

Positions the element. Called when the window is resized.

**Signature:**

```typescript
position(metrics: UiMetrics, savedPositions: Rect[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  metrics | UiMetrics | The workspace metrics. |
|  savedPositions | [Rect](./blockly.utils.rect.md)<!-- -->\[\] | List of rectangles that are already on the workspace. |

**Returns:**

void
